name: Locked (itch) (Zion arts)
description:
Main description:

In this game you play as a 11-year-old boy, who has lost both of his parents. You must put in codes in the goal of finding his mother again (Or maybe you want to try and find everything there is instead.). Have fun and good luck!

Controls:

English:

"Use arrow keys to move.

Enter to close text.

S saves your game and L loads save files.

Press four number keys to start.

Use backspace to reset the number code if needed.

Goal is to find the end, good luck, and have fun!"

Spanish:

"Utiliza las teclas de las flechas para mover.

"Intro" para cerrar este mensaje.

'S' para salvar a tu juego y 'L' carga a uno de esos archivos.

Toca sobre cuatro teclas de numera para comenzar. 

Utiliza "borrar" para reiniciar el código de número si hace falta.

El objetivo es encontrar el fin, buena suerte, y ¡diviértete!"

Esperanto:

"Uz sago ŝlosiloj de movi. 

Eniri fermi tekston. 

S savas via ludo kaj L ŝarĝ konservi dosierojn. 

Gazetaro kvar nombro ŝlosiloj de komenci. 

Uz backspace al reŝarg la nombro kodo se necesas. 

Celo estos trovi la fin, fortunon, kaj sin amuz!"

Credits:

Main game made by me using GMS2(Game dev), bandlab(For music), and Gimp(For art). To add to this, I used several sites for sound effects. Spanish translation by Alexxx#2886 on discord, Esperanto translation by me using google translate, traduku(Another machine translator), and Glosbe(Dictionary). All made for the Brackey's 2022_1 jam. (In the future update adding the Japanese translation and possibly some bug fixes, the Japanese translation will most likely be done by WsWoWa#8833 on discord)
